products.title: Bushnell Tour V2 Edition
products.description:
The Bushnell Tour V2 Edition is a golf GPS laser rangefinder that is powerful as well as compact, making it convenient and easy to carry with you around the course for the day.

The Tour V2 Edition has an ergonomic shape and a high tack grip that rests in your hand, making for a good fit and added comfort for continued use. It comes with a pinseeker feature that allows you to zero in on the flag from whatever your distance. It also comes with the scan feature which displays multiple ranges while panning. It ranges from 5-1000 yards/meters, and 300 yards to the flag. This golf GPS is intended for avid golfers or those who acitvely participate in tournament play.
This model is related to the Bushnell Tour V2 Slope that has a lot of the same features, but has an added slope feature that compensates for the distance.

Features

  • golf GPS
  • laser rangefinder
  • compact size
  • pinseeker feature
  • scan feature
  • ergonomic shape
  • high tack grip
  • range 5-1000 yards/meters or 300 yards to the flag
  • +/- 1 yard accuracy
  • 5x magnification
  • 3 volt lithium ion battery
  • rainproof
  • no reflective prism required
